Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِمَنْ عَلِمَ شِدَّةَ انْتِقَامِ اللَّهِ مِنْهُ وَهُوَ مُقِيمٌ عَلَى الْإِصْرَارِ
enWisdom: The companion of vices is the hostage of [his] misdeeds

Wisdom: عَجِبْتُ لِمَنْ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّ لِلْأَعْمَالِ [الأعمال‏] جَزَاءً كَيْفَ لَا يُحْسِنُ عَمَلَهُ
enWisdom: I am amazed at the one who knows that there is reward for [good] deeds, how can he not make his actions righteous?!
One who is certain about [divine] reward does good [deeds]

Wisdom: مَنْ صَدَّقَ بِالْمُجَازَاةِ لَمْ يُؤْثِرْ غَيْرَ الْحُسْنَى
enWisdom: One who believes in [divine] requital does not choose [to do] anything but good

Wisdom: مَنْ قَوِيَ دِينُهُ أَيْقَنَ بِالْجَزَاءِ وَرَضِيَ بِمَوَاقِعِ الْقَضَاءِ
enWisdom: One whose faith is strong is certain about the reward [he will get for his good actions] and is satisfied with whatever has been decreed [for him by Allah]

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُوقِنْ بِالْجَزَاءِ أَفْسَدَ الشَّكُّ يَقِينَهُ
enWisdom: One who is not certain of the recompense [for actions], doubt has corrupted his certitude

Wisdom: لَا يَعْمَلُ بِالْعِلْمِ إِلَّا مَنْ أَيْقَنَ بِفَضْلِ الْأَجْرِ فِيهِ
enWisdom: Nobody acts upon [his] knowledge except the one who is certain about the greatness of its reward
